lines.text: It's basically one world slowly imposing itself on another.
You can't choose when you're born or when you die, but you can choose how you live.
Someday you're going to love somebody with all the intensity of the Southern Hemisphere. I just want that someone to be me.
Everybody has one spot in the universe, and nothing can knock you out of that spot, not even dying.
I guess I'm a militant optimist who believes in passion.
Come on, there's a Starbucks-free America out there.
